title: Microsoft updates Messaging app with new Skype Messaging feature for Windows 10 Mobile
text:
Microsoft updates Messaging app with new Skype Messaging feature for Windows 10 Mobile 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
If you are running Windows 10 Mobile things just got a lot more interesting. The Microsoft Messaging app has been updated from 1.0.12715 to ...
